amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-3 to clarify that this legislation will not affect the authority of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to mandate vaccination requirements against any other disease in the future for noncitizens who are nonimmigrants entering the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 222 (Roll no. 110).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McGovern.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 222 (Roll no. 110).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
